Genesis__05.1: This is the book of the generation of Adam. In the day that God created man, he made him to the likeness of God.
Genesis__05.2: He created them male and female; and blessed them: and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.
Genesis__05.3: And Adam lived a hundred and thirty years, and begot a son to his own image and likeness, and called his name Seth.
Genesis__05.4: And the days of Adam, after he begot Seth, were eight hundred years: and he begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.5: And all the time that Adam lived came to nine hundred and thirty years, and he died.
Genesis__05.6: Seth also lived a hundred and five years, and begot Enos.
Genesis__05.7: And Seth lived after he begot Enos, eight hundred and seven years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.8: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years, and he died.
Genesis__05.9: And Enos lived ninety years, and begot Cainan.
Genesis__05.10: After whose birth he lived eight hundred and fifteen years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.11: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years, and he died.
Genesis__05.12: And Cainan lived seventy years, and begot Malaleel.
Genesis__05.13: And Cainan lived after he begot Malaleel, eight hundred and forty years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.14: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years, and he died.
Genesis__05.15: And Malaleel lived sixty-five years, and begot Jared.
Genesis__05.16: And Malaleel lived after he begot Jared, eight hundred and thirty years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.17: And all the days of Malaleel were eight hundred and ninety-five years, and he died.
Genesis__05.18: And Jared lived a hundred and sixty-two years, and begot Henoch.
Genesis__05.19: And Jared lived after he begot Henoch, eight hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.20: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred and sixty-two years, and he died.
Genesis__05.21: And Henoch lived sixty-five years, and begot Mathusala.
Genesis__05.22: And Henoch walked with God: and lived after he begot Mathusala, three hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.23: And all the days of Henoch were three hundred and sixty-five years.
Genesis__05.24: And he walked with God, and was seen no more: because God took him.
Genesis__05.25: And Mathusala lived a hundred and eighty-seven years, and begot Lamech.
Genesis__05.26: And Mathusala lived after he begot Lamech, seven hundred and eighty-two years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.27: And all the days of Mathusala were nine hundred and sixty-nine years, and he died.
Genesis__05.28: And Lamech lived a hundred and eighty-two years, and begot a son.
Genesis__05.29: And he called his name Noe, saying: This same shall comfort us from the works and labours of our hands on the earth, which the Lord hath cursed.
Genesis__05.30: And Lamech lived after he begot Noe, five hundred and ninety-five years, and begot sons and daughters.
Genesis__05.31: And all the days of Lamech came to seven hundred and seventy-seven years, and he died. And Noe, when he was five hundred years old, begot Sem, Cham, and Japheth.
